channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: ProlificDreamer: High-Fidelity and Diverse Text-to-3D Generation with Variational Score Distillation
item.description: In comparison, VSD works well with various CFG weights as ancestral sampling from diffusion models and simultaneously improves the diversity and sample quality with a common CFG weight (i. e., $7. 5$).

item.title: Stabilizing Transformer Training by Preventing Attention Entropy Collapse
item.description: We show that $\sigma$Reparam provides stability and robustness with respect to the choice of hyperparameters, going so far as enabling training (a) a Vision Transformer {to competitive performance} without warmup, weight decay, layer normalization or adaptive optimizers; (b) deep architectures in machine translation and (c) speech recognition to competitive performance without warmup and adaptive optimizers.

item.title: Pearl: A Production-ready Reinforcement Learning Agent
item.description: Reinforcement Learning (RL) offers a versatile framework for achieving long-term goals.

item.title: OccNeRF: Self-Supervised Multi-Camera Occupancy Prediction with Neural Radiance Fields
item.description: Moreover, for semantic occupancy prediction, we design several strategies to polish the prompts and filter the outputs of a pretrained open-vocabulary 2D segmentation model.

item.title: Disentangling Writer and Character Styles for Handwriting Generation
item.description: In light of this, we propose to disentangle the style representations at both writer and character levels from individual handwritings to synthesize realistic stylized online handwritten characters.

item.title: EdgeSAM: Prompt-In-the-Loop Distillation for On-Device Deployment of SAM
item.description: It is also the first SAM variant that can run at over 30 FPS on an iPhone 14.

item.title: MCANet: Medical Image Segmentation with Multi-Scale Cross-Axis Attention
item.description: To process the significant variations of lesion regions or organs in individual sizes and shapes, we also use multiple convolutions of strip-shape kernels with different kernel sizes in each axial attention path to improve the efficiency of the proposed MCA in encoding spatial information.

item.title: Mamba: Linear-Time Sequence Modeling with Selective State Spaces
item.description: Foundation models, now powering most of the exciting applications in deep learning, are almost universally based on the Transformer architecture and its core attention module.

item.title: UDiffText: A Unified Framework for High-quality Text Synthesis in Arbitrary Images via Character-aware Diffusion Models
item.description: Text-to-Image (T2I) generation methods based on diffusion model have garnered significant attention in the last few years.

item.title: DemoFusion: Democratising High-Resolution Image Generation With No $$$
item.description: High-resolution image generation with Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI) has immense potential but, due to the enormous capital investment required for training, it is increasingly centralised to a few large corporations, and hidden behind paywalls.

item.title: PromptBench: A Unified Library for Evaluation of Large Language Models
item.description: The evaluation of large language models (LLMs) is crucial to assess their performance and mitigate potential security risks.

item.title: S-LoRA: Serving Thousands of Concurrent LoRA Adapters
item.description: To capitalize on these opportunities, we present S-LoRA, a system designed for the scalable serving of many LoRA adapters.

item.title: A Picture is Worth More Than 77 Text Tokens: Evaluating CLIP-Style Models on Dense Captions
item.description: Curation methods for massive vision-language datasets trade off between dataset size and quality.

item.title: LMDrive: Closed-Loop End-to-End Driving with Large Language Models
item.description: On the other hand, previous autonomous driving methods tend to rely on limited-format inputs (e. g. sensor data and navigation waypoints), restricting the vehicle's ability to understand language information and interact with humans.

item.title: Natural and Robust Walking using Reinforcement Learning without Demonstrations in High-Dimensional Musculoskeletal Models
item.description: Humans excel at robust bipedal walking in complex natural environments.

item.title: LongLLMLingua: Accelerating and Enhancing LLMs in Long Context Scenarios via Prompt Compression
item.description: Inspired by these findings, we propose LongLLMLingua for prompt compression towards improving LLMs' perception of the key information to simultaneously address the three challenges.

item.title: FreeInit: Bridging Initialization Gap in Video Diffusion Models
item.description: Though diffusion-based video generation has witnessed rapid progress, the inference results of existing models still exhibit unsatisfactory temporal consistency and unnatural dynamics.

item.title: Repurposing Diffusion-Based Image Generators for Monocular Depth Estimation
item.description: Monocular depth estimation is a fundamental computer vision task.

item.title: OpenVoice: Versatile Instant Voice Cloning
item.description: The voice styles are not directly copied from and constrained by the style of the reference speaker.

item.title: Agent Attention: On the Integration of Softmax and Linear Attention
item.description: Specifically, the Agent Attention, denoted as a quadruple $(Q, A, K, V)$, introduces an additional set of agent tokens $A$ into the conventional attention module.
